name: Skirt Sliding
description:
Three beauties in the park are free to choose
In the game, players can choose one of the three beauties as the target of the prank and play prank on her. If it fails, the beauty may be hurt.

simple control
You only need to control the sprint speed and control the character to squat at the right time to complete the prank, but this is a test of the player's operation, and only powerful people can complete the prank.

Instructions:
Spacebar: Control the speed of the character's sprint

x key: control the character to squat

Description of adult content:
This game contains some nudity.
